mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.ID) FROM COMMENT A LEFT JOIN MEM_DETAIL B ON 1=1 AND B.MEM_ID=A.CONFIRM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.CONTENTS_TYPE = #{contentsType} AND A.CONTENTS_ID = #{contentsId}

SELECT A.ID ,A.CONTENTS_TYPE ,A.CONTENTS_ID ,A.REF_CONTENTS_ID ,A.COMENT ,A.CONFIRM_ID ,A.DELETE_YN ,A.REG_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DATE ,A.UPT_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPT_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPT_DATE ,B.NICKNAME ,B.MEM_PROFILE_IMG FROM COMMENT A LEFT JOIN MEMBER B ON 1=1 AND B.MEM_ID=A.CONFIRM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.CONTENTS_TYPE = #{contentsType} AND A.CONTENTS_ID = #{contentsId} AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N' LIMIT ${(pageNo-1)*listNo},${listNo}
